Merge two or more datasets

Source: vignettes/processing-merge-datasets.Rmd
processing-merge-datasets.Rmd

We previously showed how to create a gwasglue2 DataSet object. Here, we will show how to merge two or more DataSets.



Setup 

library(gwasglue2)
library(ieugwasr)



Functions

  • merge_datasets(): Merge a list of two or more DataSet objects.



Example

The function listed above work on a DataSet object. WWe will use DataSet objects (dataset1 and dataset2) like the ones created in the Create a dataset section. By, default, the merge_datasets() function will harmonise again the data.

datasets <- list(dataset1, dataset2)
merge_dataset <- merge_datasets(datasets)
